text: A pharmacy may charge any current selling price, discount, service availability or service charge, at any time; provided, that the poster and sources of consumer information are adjusted accordingly.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 33-716.

1973 Ed., § 33-816.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-804.51.

DC CODE § 48-801.06

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Consumer information to reflect actual charges.
